content.description: The Cave Route follows the right side of bolts out the gigantic obvious cave. There are a few bolts deeper in the cave that if connected could make for a harder extension but the positioning of the bolts into the right side of the cave would be awkward/contrived/weird.
content.location: Located in the massive cave on the North Rim of the canyon, past Cactus Kiss Area and up from there.

content.description: The Cave Area holds one route. its found on the right side of the canyon, just past Cactus Kiss Area you'll continue down canyon and once you notice an access point leading straight up to the rim on your right, follow that to the obvious gigantic cave.
